subject:
Re: [R] looking for the na.omit equivalent for a matrix of
	characters
body:
Surely all you need to do is change them to missing and use na.omit.
e.g.

x <- matrix(letters, 13, 2)
x[4] <- "NA"  # put one in the middle


is.na(x[x == "NA"]) <- TRUE
(x <- na.omit(x))

the NA
